DOCNAME: CASE OF KOKOL AND OTHERS v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . In DATE , ORG and LANGUAGE ( PERSON ) , a ORG body responsible , inter alia , for motorway construction , expropriated CARDINAL plots of land belonging to the applicants in GPE in order to build ORG . A committee of experts assessed the value of the land and the sum so fixed was paid to them when the expropriation took place .

CARDINAL . Following the applicants ' requests for increased compensation , on CARDINAL DATE ORG of First Instance awarded them additional compensation of MONEY ( TRL ) ( MONEY ( EUR ) ) , plus interest at the statutory rate applicable at the date of the court 's decisions , running from DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the decision of ORG was served on the applicants .
CARDINAL . On DATE the administration paid the applicants TRL CARDINAL ( approximately EUR CARDINAL ) in additional compensation together with interest .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law and practice are set out in the Aka v. GPE judgment of DATE ( Reports of Judgments and Decisions CARDINAL-VI , § § CARDINAL - CARDINAL ) .
